name: Homemade Pureed Sweet Potato Baby Food
author: tcasa
summary: A quick and easy method for providing baby food for your little one without any added preservatives, sugar, or salt. Can store cooked puree for 3 days in refrigerator or 3 months in freezer.
ingredients: 2  sweet potatoes, peeled and halved, or more as desired
directions: Fill a small saucepan with water; add sweet potatoes
Bring water to a boil and cook sweet potatoes until tender enough to break apart with a fork, 25 to 30 minutes
Transfer sweet potatoes to a food processor or an immersion blender cup, reserving the cooking water
Add 1/2 to 3/4 cup cooking water and blend until desired consistency is reached
